website_summaries.verdict: A nice large pot that comes with great tools to help with canning.
pros: Allows you to do seven jars at one time
All of the pieces that come with this set are designed to fit inside the container when not in use
cons: Not designed for use on a glasstop stove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Canning is a relatively new hobbie for me and my 14-year-old daughter. In the past, we’ve fumbledwith DIY racks, kitchen tongs and all the wrong tools. This year, as we prepared for our county youth fair and preparing her award winning salsa, we opted to purchase canning equipment to cutdown on frustration and guesswork. This was the perfect solution! Not only is this kit a low-price solution, it also contains all the tools needed to canning. It was easy and safe enough for my daughter to work with independently. I’m very pleased and look forward to using this kit frequently.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMama

customer_reviews.title: the funnel is the best, the little gizmo with the magnet is for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started canning--I'm a newbie and had no idea what all of the gadgets were for. Let me tell you--you will use each of these. The spatula has a wooden measuring stick handle so you can be sure your water is at least one inch above your cans, the funnel is the best, the little gizmo with the magnet is for getting tops out of the sterilization pot with ease....everything else is pretty self explanatory. This is not only my first canning set up, my guess is it will be the only one I ever need. One caveat--the magnet came out of its holder but it was easily put back in and has stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: My canning kit arrived so i started the process of preparing my 40 pounds of tomatoes . I should have checked the pot over because it had a hole in it and was unusable For canning a waste of time and waste of an entire day of work and produce because im 40 min away from a store i can get a replacement from. Luckily i get to stay home monday so Ups can pick it up and i can get a refund in around 2 weeks. Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for canning and more. I've use this product half a dozen times now and is perfect for the average canner. The only downside to this product is the metal grate that you place into the pot. It rusts fairly easily and has to be removed and dried from the water immediately. Other than that, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to order this item extremely excited to get it then when I did receive it completely damaged on all sides and the canning materials were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Set & works on Glass Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: What a great starter set!. I read a lot of reviews & questions. I have a glass cooktop & one person said it would not work because the pot had ridges on the bottom. I still wanted to TRY. It was a great purchase because I absolutely had no problem getting the pot to boiling temperature or keeping it boiling during the canning process. I am DELIGHTED. It was just as described & I was impressed by the quality & price. I did a lot of research on canning. I needed just a few more items to get started. I needed jars, scooped spoon and candy thermometer. It was really fun & easier than expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: 100% Happy
customer_reviews.text: Our first crop of grapes was near time to harvest. We decide to juice and can them for later use. We ordered the Granite Ware Canning Set (8 pc) and it arrived on time and everything was as described in the product posting. We used the canning set last weekend 9/2/17 and we could not be happier. This is very similar to a set my mother used to can fruits when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: No glass top stoves!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not recommended for a glass top stove! Nothing in the description stated that until it arrived. I can go outside with an open burner but I would not have bought it had I known that beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for newbies.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! The first one I got was damaged when I got it, but they replaced it immediately! I love it! Only issue I had was the magnet on the canning lid lifter fell apart while using, and I had to search through several finished jars of preserves to find the magnet on the inside of one of the lids, and then reprocess the jars since I had opened them after the lids had popped...Otherwise great canning kit!
customer_reviews.author: California Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Rusty rack!! Thin metal in the pots.
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete set but, the pots are very thin and don't transfer heat very well. Like others have said, My jar rack is rusting after one use! There's also a chip in the blanched, so it has a rust spot too. I should go look at the flea markets for an old one that would probably be better made. I had an old one but got rid of it when we moved 12 years ago, should have kept it!!
customer_reviews.author: Blkkarma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set, with things you need but don't realize you do
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need other than the food and the jars. Even things I hadn't realized I'd need. The funnel is perfect, the rack and pot are the perfect size. It had never occurred to me that a stick with a little magnet on the end would be critical, but there it was! Couldn't be happier with this set.
customer_reviews.author: nalissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Since my reception of my bath canner it has been used twice a week to can all size jars from jams to pickled peppers. We even use it on a glass top oven and haven't had any issues in getting it to boil even when almost full. The best part is the construction allows it to be sturdy but lightweight which makes a difference when moving a full pot from the sink to the stove.
customer_reviews.author: DR40

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canning kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit as soon as it arrived to can a flood of tomatoes from my garden. The kit had lots of helpful tools, in addition to the basic pot and jar container rack. It was my first experience at canning and all went well. I was also very pleased with the quality of all the pieces, especially since the price was much lower than other kits I considered. I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: nice basic set for the occasional canner I do not ...
customer_reviews.text: nice basic set for the occasional canner I do not have big enough garden for extensive canning but enjoy canning salsas and other small batches This canner was a complete reasonably priced set that is easy to use and works well for the home canner not ready for more expensive pressure canners but still wants to produce a quality product for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Meme6

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set online reluctantly for when I buy something like this I likr to touch it feel how heavy it is. But this was my 1st time canning .The elderberries where picked and washed and I could not find a time to get to a store and pick one up So I ordered Pleasantly surprise Strong came with all I needed Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Taryen Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality product. I purchased this, used it once, and returned. The handle to the jar lifter was not assembled properly when I received, I fixed it easily. However the first time I used it came loose again almost causing me to drop a full jar back into the pot of boiling water. The wire basket is made as cheaply as possible. The handles do not hook to the sides very well, one time while I had it raised removing jars one handle came loose dropping the whole basket back into the pot of boiling water. I was very lucky to not get burned during either of these accidents. Don't buy this garbage. Take a stand for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lance K

customer_reviews.title: but the product arrived slightly damaged with two major dents on the bottom of the pot that were bad enough to make the enamel chip off
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Would rate five stars, but the product arrived slightly damaged with two major dents on the bottom of the pot that were bad enough to make the enamel chip off. These will surely be rust spots before too long. The other pieces were a nice add and definitely useful. This product DOES work on a glass top stove. We live in Europe and the stoves are small and in this country mostly electric. We put it on the largest coil, and since some of the pot reached another, we turned that on too. Lid on water was boiling in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Same one I had had for years
customer_reviews.text: This caner is the same one I have had for many years and is why I bought it again. Works perfectly with the exception of the jar grabber. The jar grabber is completely reversed. You couldn't grab a jar with it if you tried. Without it you cannot get jars in or out of the scalding hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ellett

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I just received the 8-piece canning set. There was a made in China sticker on everything except for the black pot. It’s not that I have anything against things made in China (so many of our everyday products are) , but I don’t like that Granite•Ware is not upfront about it. They give the impression that this whole set is made in the USA. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Berger

customer_reviews.title: It worked on a glass top stove, despite warning
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I waited to use this before reviewing. I didn't notice the warning message until after I purchased this but it said no glass top stoves. Well I gave it a try anyway. And it worked great! The tools in the 9 piece set are essential and the pan is huge so lots of cans can fit. I'm extremely happy with its performance so far. And as I said above it does work with a glass top stove! Atleast mine it did
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: The jar rack rusted after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: The jar rack rusted after 3rd use and the height/depth of the pot is insufficient for regular 16oz mason jars: you have to cover them with at least an inch of water, and that's when things go south with water boiling out of the pot and onto the stove thus extinguishing the burner.
customer_reviews.author: Aen

customer_reviews.title: All the tools included make it easy to place jars in the canner
customer_reviews.text: This set has absolutely everything needed for home canning and blanching/freezing. It's been hot this summer where we live, so we've used the canning pot outside with propane heat. All the tools included make it easy to place jars in the canner, retrieve them, as well as retrieving rings from the boiling water. The blancher is so easy to use with the colander for holding vegetables in ice water before freezing. Both units have a small amount of instructions for use. The blancher has a chart for times for blanching and ice water bath. Very handy. We both think this is the best investment we've made in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: chevythunderz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome except
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this five stars because the pot is great and all the utensils that came with the kit are easy to use and make canning much easier, but, the canning rack is starting to rust after only 4 uses and that seems a little wrong to me. The rusted joints will eventually make it fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel KN

customer_reviews.title: It gets you going with water bath canning
customer_reviews.text: This is a good place to start water bath canning. The only thing I didn't particularly like (I didn't dislike it, it's just "ok") is the measuring on the wooden handle of the rubber spatula/ bubble remover. I would prefer it to be better marked and not on wood, but like I said...It's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ALL IN ONE GREAT COMBO!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered this. A little back round, I am a chef at a conference center and I have a 85ftX85ft organic garden and boy oh boy let me tell you this year I was swimming in produce. I had no idea where to put these 200 lbs + tomatoes or cucumber or eggplant etc etc etc so I thought why not preserve them. So I did some pretty extensive research and thought this would be the best bang for my buck........... 60 jars later this is still easy enough to pump out mass quantities while have all the equipment needed right out of the box............ GREAT DEAL !!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but is much larger than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit as an intro set and it works great. I've used the funnel and spatula many times, while other parts I found less useful. I see what other reviewers are saying about the rack being too big and jars just falling over, but it wasn't too much of a problem for me. My only complaint is that it's huge, much larger than it has to be to get the job done on smaller jars. When it's full of water I can't lift it out of the sink, so I have to bail it by hand. I would imagine that if you had a smaller sink you would have to fill it by hand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and value
customer_reviews.text: I looked around to find a affordable but reliable canning set and settled on "Granite Ware". It was packaged beyond what was needed and as a result there wasn't a ding or scratch. The pot itself is sturdy and the tools were wrapped and boxed separately. I'm just beginning to can my own garden vegetables and I highly recommend this set for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: sarge518

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to make salsa with fresh peppers from the garden and needed something for canning. This setup works perfectly. You can sanitize the jars and do the final preserving cook with one pot and the tools come in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: rust
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, rust on rack after one use, and the magnetic lid lifter; the magnet came out. For the price it really is not worth it. I wish I had done more research. The container is made cheaply. I wish I could get my money back on this. And no I just bought it so it isn't like I have had it for months.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry readsbychoice

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the one my mother had when I was a kid....I have canned pints and quarts in this and it works great and all of the pieces that come with it are great they are not junk....
customer_reviews.author: Dapner Dan

customer_reviews.title: Heats Easily and Thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: This canner is taller and a little slimmer than my older model. The design makes it more effective for canning and it still holds the same amount of jars. I have had good results with keeping the kettle boiling.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Does this work exactly as described, yes. Taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Does this work exactly as described, yes. Taking away a star because the rack rusted after the first use. The price is worth it to get all the other tools though, so definitely a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Very very thin material lots of dents and scratches
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin material lots of dents and scratches I will be returning this item The appliances that were supposed to be in close never came I just haven’t had a chance to return it yet but what a pain
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jannelle

customer_reviews.title: Makes canning easy
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to canning and wanted a set with all the necessary supplies. I was intimidated at first but this kit made it easy and everything I’ve canned has turned out great. I’d prefer the funnel to be metal but the hard plastic version included works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Bad enamel.  But to get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The pot must have had some hard blows during transit. There were a few minor dents that once heated, had the endometrium pop off. Inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Quick to rust
customer_reviews.text: I used this once to can marmalade and it has already begun to rust. Additionally, my order did not arrive with all of the pieces. I only received the pot with cover, strainer, and the (now rusting) wire rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good canning set-up
customer_reviews.text: Great kit- everything you need and good price. Everything is pretty good quality and looks like it will last- Ive used it twice and am pretty happy with it. Its worth noting, I'm a beginner, and I'm glad I went with the kit, because the spatula, funnel, jar grips and the rest of it are all more useful for canning than what I already have.
customer_reviews.author: amphibia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this set! I couldn't wait to get it in the mail to test it out! Once upon receiving my husband and I started out with an easy strawberry jam recipe. After using it I found that it was a great set. It was easy to use,cleaned up nicely and made great jam! If you are looking to start canning and don't want to spend tons incase it's not your thing, this set is great! I don't think I want an expensive set after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great canning set
customer_reviews.text: This canning set is nicely complete. It has a rack which fits 7 quarts, a medium sized colander, and other tools as shown in the picture. They appear to be well made. The canner uses less water than my old canner but is plenty of room for the amount of water needed. I cold pack bottled peaches, pears and berries in it and water bath preserves to make sure they seal. I am happy with this set. I bought this set for a daughter who wants to start canning also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had pieces of Granite Ware for thirty years. Take care of it and it will last years.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great size and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size and all the goodies that came with the pot. My first attempt at making jam was a great success. Couldn’t have done it without this set. Didn’t rate easy to clean as I have a double sink and this pot is enormous. But you need is size.
customer_reviews.author: Anydots

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for beginning canning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a novice, to turn a lot of lemons into lemon marmalade. The pieces were easy to use together and all performed as expected. I successfully produced two batches, all jars properly sealing. A positive experience, encouraging future projects.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great canning kit. Bought this after I got into canning last summer. It's a MUST HAVE. Sturdy. Comes exactly as advertised. Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this canner! I have long been a gardener and this year I made the next move on to canning. I got the full 12 piece set and am so glad that I did because there was not one thing I did not use! And minus having to get cans and the stuff to go in the jars it had absolutely everything that I needed included! The canner was the perfect big size to hold a good amount of pint jars (this was the only size that I used) was simple and easy and worked perfect I did not have a single can not get sealed!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Item lid was bent on both sides so I had to send it back. Aside from the bent lid, it seemed OK. Going to try to order again, possibly from different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Revak

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend for a starter kit as I am a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Is what it says it is and works well. The wire rack seems a little flimsy and could be strengthened a bit to be honest. The large pot is huge and much bigger than I had imagined. considerably larger than a average burner. Takes much longer than you would expect to bring to a boil because of the amount of water in this very spacious pot, so make extra time. I would recommend for a starter kit as I am a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ol' fashion cookware!
customer_reviews.text: It good to see something that has worked for years still being made. Just like my mom had back in the 50's. Hers didn't come with tools. Nice kit. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Peck

customer_reviews.title: so this set is a really great value. It has everything you need for your ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started canning, so this set is a really great value. It has everything you need for your prep work and the small pot is great for steaming veggies. The jars fit well and the lifting rack is well built and very easy to use. The quality is good and the pots are easy to clean by hand or in the dishwasher. Will definitely recommend this set to others!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMamma

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent kit to get you started on canning. After my first use the rack started rusting and the pot got slightly discolored. I don't think this is a big deal as long as you don't expect to use it forever. I would definitely recommend this kit to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good set
customer_reviews.text: My first canning set. Worked well so far for my first two times. The jar tongs aren't great. I kept dropping the jars until I decided to hold the jar underneath with a pot holder when removing them. Happy with everything else
customer_reviews.author: Julie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Granite Ware Canning Kit - 9 piece
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long time since I had the time to spend in my garden, and now that I am reaping that hard work, I needed a canning kit. I'm not hard core, and a simple set would do. This one fit my needs perfectly, and I have spent weeks "putting up" jam, preserves, vegetables, and mostly marinara sauce (the tomatoes are wild this year). The kit has everything you need, is self contained for storage, and is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mother

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: My old one was 50 years old. Still was ok but this one has no rust spots so I can cook in it. Hope it lasts a lond time.
customer_reviews.author: sheila z.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap. Major defects in the enamel coating (smudges, fingerprints) and a dented canner. The jar holder is probably not food safe stainless steel--all of the weld joints began to heavily rust after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this canner as one of the used very good condition variations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this canner as one of the used very good condition variations. It did arrive repackaged but the packaging was very secure. It's a great water bath canner and the tools that come with it work well. I think there are other probably better quality canning supplies out there but for beginners like myself it's a great start to put you on your way to canning and preserving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first ever attempt at canning anything, it worked great and the accessory tools were a must so this all in one kit was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AGuyInNebraska

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good set for beginners. The jar gripper dropped a jar or two but overall its a good set to buy. Will buy a new jar gripper with better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product for canning
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. It was excellent for canning. I love that it is a Made in USA product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I am brandnew to canning, but this kit is awesome. The weekend I got this, I made 6 different jams and jellies. The utensils it came with were seriously everything that was needed to get the job done safely. I love it. I have not used the blancher yet, but I am sure it's fantastic, too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Johns

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I especially like to pay a reasonable price for quality stuff, and this fits that bill. Good find!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My first year canning and this has been a perfect fit into our new lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: My first year canning and this has been a perfect fit into our new lifestyle! It does not fit standard Ball quart size jars as far and depth in the pot. Had a hard time keeping water lever over the top of the jars. But for a first timer it has worked great. Since it is just my husband and I canning in pints is more ideal for us. But if I decide to do larger I will have to find a new pot.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it arrived damaged so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pray there is no damage
customer_reviews.text: It's a great set. I bought this as a Christmas present and was disappointed to find the lid damaged. Tried to replace the lid through Amazon and ended up with a new set that I was charged for and still have a damaged lid. They don't make replacing pieces possible ...Guess I'm stuck!
customer_reviews.author: Mak David Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Canning Rack missing
customer_reviews.text: Dissappointed. Opened yesterday to use product and the canning rack was missing. Threw out box many days ago so can't return. Would love a rack ASAP. Never wait until you need to use an item to unpack!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am the first time water bath canner. I used it for the first time today. other than the colander that comes with it is way too small, it is a good set... Especially for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Evan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: A very good set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: The lid arrived with a couple of chips around the edge but to be honest, I've added one or two since then. I'm very happy with this purchase. Every tool I would need was included.
customer_reviews.author: R L Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality set
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality set. I was surprised at the quality for the low price. Also had some things that I have never had as part of the set. I may buy one more set just to have an extra if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kovac

customer_reviews.title: It is as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly utilitarian product. It functions as required and as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best gift I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gif for my Grandson who wants to be a chef when graduates. He is very happy with the gift. I am going to get some jelly soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Jane Prochaska

customer_reviews.title: Love Canner
customer_reviews.text: I am new at canning and it works out wonderful for water bath canning. Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W

customer_reviews.title: Great system for being so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great system for being so cheap. it has things you wouldnt even think of to use. Even a stick with a magnet on the end to pick up those thin lids after boiling them to sterilize was ingenious! I strongly recommend and endorse
customer_reviews.author: Sally Owens

customer_reviews.title: What it contains and what it's made of
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Has all you need for small canning jobs
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my canning teacher. Nice looking & sturdy canning pot.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for large batches.
customer_reviews.text: I have made several batches of jams and other canning. The size and usefulness cannot be over stated.
customer_reviews.author: MrGreentree

customer_reviews.title: This pot is so flimsy.  Also it arrived damaged.  No wonder!!
customer_reviews.text: The pan is thin and the bottom of the pan is lop sided. The lid arrived dented. Very disappointed, especially since my tomatoes are ready to be canned and the pot is a flop.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot! Rack does rust joints.
customer_reviews.text: Pot is heavy duty and I've never had a problem with it. Metal insert for the bell jars rusted at the joints.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brown

customer_reviews.title: A Great Place to Start
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a couple of times so far, but it performed well. I have not run into any of the problems that I saw in other reviews, so I'm happy with it- and it certainly has helped me with canning. If you're a beginner, as I was, this is a good place to start.
customer_reviews.author: Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience
customer_reviews.text: The gadgets that come with this pot are much needed and work great. The enamel on the pot wore significantly during the first canning season I had it. Really does not like high temperatures I guess and perhaps a gas burning stove. Will probably have to chuck the pot at this point as I’ve not much use for it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ehubley

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Made my first batch of beans an easy success. I just have to get my timing down better. I do have to agree with some of the other reviews concerning the wire basket...one use and slight rust spots already. Other than that....very happy with the utensils, size of pots, and the blancher is nice too. Can't wait for the next batch!
customer_reviews.author: Banker Man

customer_reviews.title: You want this
customer_reviews.text: Well made, a perfect kit for the home. Contains everything you need to preserve food for your family. Not only can you preserve food it is also great for steaming food from lobsters to vegetables. Will last for generations.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Very much needed when canning
customer_reviews.text: Very much needed when canning. Not all canning needs a Pressure Canner. If new to canning, definitely wash between batches. Forgot to once and ended up with sediment in my jars. The tools are not the best, worked for a while. I ended up purchasing a set of Prepworks by Progressive which are far better.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: worked great was just what my daughter and I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great was just what my daughter and I need to begin to learn how to can was fun spending time like this with her, we learned laughed and hopefully both taught ourselves a life skill which may be used in the future
customer_reviews.author: Busy Dad

customer_reviews.title: I am loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole kit, the quality of each item is wonderful and the canner itself is actually a lot bigger than I had thought which is great, it's a great size for canning, I'm so happy I ordered this exact set and recommend it to anyone wanting to get into canning or to anyone who has canned for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: sarah ertzberger

customer_reviews.title: Ready To Can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement product to use in canning. This is deeper than my previous canner and it comes equipped with the necessary tools, too!
customer_reviews.author: Molly's  mom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Adequate equipment for canning. The pot rusted a bit after a few uses but that's minor. Otherwise, I was able to make many batches of jams and can't wait to try canning other fruits and sauces. Handles about 6-7 8 oz jars nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Laurancn

customer_reviews.title: gave this as a gift and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and it had everything needed to do her canning. the price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: magneticblueyes

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late with bent lid
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the photo the lid is damaged3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Has everything you need for hot water bath canning.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rogn

customer_reviews.title: Very good item for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Very first time I tried to can food. Did an excellent job for me and will be using it again for more canning. I loved the items that came with the pot, did not have to buy them separately because I would not have know what I needed to do the job. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dot Schneebeli

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: A basic canning pot, with usual gear to do the job. We have zero problems and liked the price.
customer_reviews.author: Art Welling

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged but didn’t know until the first time using it. A crack in the bottom tripled in size once there was some heat. May have happened in shipping but can never know.
customer_reviews.author: Benn Librizzi

customer_reviews.title: JAM & JELLY MAKER
customer_reviews.text: I rated this Jam & Jelly Maker because it is so easy and comes out every time. You cannot go wrong. And it cuts you time between 50 to 75 %. Who wouldn't like it. I got it as a gift to my husband who loves to makes Jam and he loves it so much and actually went crazy making way too much jam, so we sold a lot of it at my Xmas Bazaar, and it was a hit. I would comment this item to anyone who loves to make jelly or jam but doesn't have the time the old-fashion way. It really is a life saver. VERY GOOD PRODUCT AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia I. Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Great item for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for beginners wonderful purchase wonderful price
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Hall

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for water bath canning
customer_reviews.text: I decided to start canning again and needed a new canning kit. This came with everything I needed and I was impressed with the quality. I did a lot of canning with it last summer and it still looks like new. Can't wait for the garden to start producing so I can get back to work. This was well packaged and came when promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great!
customer_reviews.text: Had my first EVER canning experience, and this kid had everything I needed, and made it so incredibly easy! Can't wait to use it again. I'm already thinking of what I'll do next!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kit.
customer_reviews.text: I liked most of the components well enough. The wooden bubble stick got moldy on me pretty quick, and I'm seeing some rust on the rack already. The other tools worked well enough and the pot is plenty large enough. Its a good beginner kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hckoep

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. The price is great for what you get. However I received my pot with a big dent on the bottom which makes my jars tip over on that side. Also the jar lifter broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo good! Such a good price too! Got it in 2 days! I'm a beginner canner, and LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Gjefle

customer_reviews.title: Canner
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like the one I had 30 yrs. ago
customer_reviews.author: R. Strause

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, works great. I love all the gadgets that come with it instead of having to purchase separately.
customer_reviews.author: Suziehomemaker

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the price very reasonable easy to use easy to clean even for a beginner
customer_reviews.author: James Hooper

product_meta.title: Granite Ware Enamel-on-Steel Canning Kit, 9-Piece
product_meta.description: Size:9 pc Set| Style Name:21 Qt, 9 pc Canning Set| Color:BlackNote: Do not use on glass cooktops (does not have a flat bottom). F0718-1 Features: -9 Piece canner set.-Holds 7 quart jar.-Made in USA. Dimensions: -Overall dimensions: 10'' H x 15.25'' W x 15.25'' D. Collection: -Graniteware collection.
feature_bullets: 9-piece canning kit includes 21-quart canner, canner lid, 7-jar rack, 9-inch colander, lid wrench, funnel, tongs, jar lifter, and magnetic lid lifter
Durable enamel-on-steel construction heats quickly and efficiently
Side loop handles help ensure safe, secure transport; coated stay-cool tool handles
Domed lid with loop handle helps trap in heat for faster boiling
Safe to use on both gas and electric stovetops; hand wash
Note: Do not use on glass cooktops (does not have a flat bottom)
